meanings.sent1: Her unwashedness was evident from the dirt on her hands.
meanings.sent2: The unwashedness of the dishes in the sink was concerning.
meanings.sent3: Despite her unwashedness, she managed to charm everyone with her smile.
meanings.sent4: The unwashedness of the windows made it hard to see outside clearly.
meanings.sent5: The unwashedness of the car was a testament to his busy schedule.

meanings.sent1: The unwashedness of the streets was a result of the recent storm.
meanings.sent2: His unwashedness was noticeable due to the stains on his shirt.
meanings.sent3: The unwashedness of the dog led to a comical chase around the yard.
meanings.sent4: The unwashedness of the river symbolized neglect for the environment.
meanings.sent5: The unwashedness of the classroom made it hard to focus on learning.
